short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Study smarter with Classmate! Instant AI answers and explanations for all your questions to help you learn and succeed!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ AI Study Companion
Struggling with your homework or study materials? Classmate has your back! With just one click, capture your question 📸 and let our AI solve your complex questions in subjects like math, chemistry, history, physics, economics, and many more!

🔑 Classmate AI Key Features:

🖥️ Smooth User Interface
Enjoy a seamless, user-friendly interface designed for efficiency. Built with community feedback in mind, it provides a focused and streamlined learning experience.

🔍 Instant Question Solving
With just one click, access accurate answers and detailed explanations instantly. Classmate offers AI-powered insights from across the web, making your research process easier.

🎓 Cross-Platform Functionality 
Classmate is integrated with 15+ leading learning management systems (LMS) to help you pass any class assignment.

🌍 Universal Compatibility
Our search engine enhances learning on over 15 popular educational platforms and across any webpage. Instantly search questions on any webpage by highlighting text with the Text Selection feature. For complex math or visual problems, use our Snapshot tool to get quick, detailed solutions with a simple click and drag.

📝 Notebook
Keep your notes and study materials organized in one place. Enjoy the flexibility of taking and accessing notes seamlessly while browsing any webpage. Import existing content or export notes effortlessly. Real-time syncing ensures your notes are always within reach.

👩‍🏫 AI Tutor
Whether you need quick answers, detailed explanations, or guidance through tough concepts, our advanced AI Tutor supports your learning journey in real-time.

💡 Enhanced Learning
Strengthen your knowledge with thorough, step-by-step explanations. Ask follow-up questions to deepen your understanding and master concepts, opening the door to limitless learning opportunities.

🤖 Advanced Artificial Intelligence
Classmate employs a powerful AI Engine and sophisticated search algorithms to provide accurate and reliable academic support. We're 20% more accurate than ChatGPT, delivering high-quality answers swiftly.

❗ Disclaimer
Classmate is intended to support your studies, not replace the fulfillment of academic requirements. Using our service can make learning more accessible and interactive, meeting a variety of educational needs. We encourage users to follow their institution's guidelines when using Classmate.

☎️ Need Help?
Visit our website to learn more and contact us with any questions you may have.

📧 Email - support@classmate.study
📖 Terms & Conditions - https://classmate.study/terms-and-conditions
🔐 Privacy Policy - https://classmate.study/privacy-policy
